definitions.definition: A lack of continuity , regularity or sequence ; a break or gap .
A point in the range of a function at which it is undefined or discontinuous .
a subterranean interface at which seismic velocities change

main_definition: A lack of continuity , regularity or sequence ; a break or gap . [from 16th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) A point in the range of a function at which it is undefined or discontinuous . [from 19th c.]
( geology ) a subterranean interface at which seismic velocities change
